attributes.action: "Nothing is agreed until everything is agreed." Make sure this is honoured!
attributes.background: Parliament must honour the above statement. If no deal is agreed. Before we leave the EU in March 2019, a fully agreed deal on everything must be in place or we leave without a deal. That was promised, that must be delivered.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
